channel.title: apple on Allen's Whiteboard
channel.description: Recent content in apple on Allen's Whiteboard

item.title: Is My Apple Pencil Broken!?
item.description: A terrible thing just almost happened, to my Apple Pencil. It was not working. Not pairing with my iPad. Not charging even with the official female2female adapter. Not showing up on the Control Center. No where. It’s B-R-O-K-E-N, broken. My Captain does not answer, his lips are pale and still, My father does not feel my arm, he has no pulse nor will, The ship is anchor’d safe and sound, its voyage closed and done,

item.title: Basic Walkthrough of ARMA: Take AAPL for Example
item.description: The ARMA model consists of two parts: Auto-Regressive and Moving Average. This is a powerful tool in predicting stationary time series. Today, we’re going to apply it on the stock price of Apple Inc. We will perform the prediction mainly in four parts: Data loading Decomposition ARMA: fit and predict Evaluation After the whole process, there’re some TBD concerns. Data loading import pandas as pd import numpy as np import
